p1.en: As Engineer with 7 years of expirience in many technical fields I possess excellentproblem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a strong work ethic. I am able to work independently and in a team, enjoying cooperation with others to achieve common goals. My effective communication skills help me convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, enabling better collaboration and understanding with the clients.

p2.en: Overall, I am confident that my experience as Full Stack Developer and Mechatronic Systems Engineer, along with my technical skills and personal traitsmake me a valuable asset to any team.

p1.en: I'm Kuba, i was born in Oświęcim in Poland in the early 90's and grew up nearby, in small village of Zaborze. It is a magical place with lots of lakes, forests and other beautiful places with a variety of wild animals which i have explored so much. That's psrobably why i fell in love with traveling and exploring wild, untamed natural landscapes.  I have an optimistic and strong-willed spirit that helps me going through every endeavor with success.

p2.en: I embrace thrilling experiences, finding joy in skate/snowboarding and parkour, as they allow me to push my physical limits and feel alive. Otherhand music is my soul's language, and helps me find solace and also expression through playing the ukulele and harmonica.
